drupalNodeEvent.title: The International Conference on Sinology Digital Humanities Technology

field_organizers.processed: Research Center for Digital Humanities of National Taiwan University

field_description.processed:
This conference will be held by the Research Center for Digital Humanities of National Taiwan University on December 17-18, 2020. The targeted subjects encompass the systems and technologies of digital humanities. This conference will also release the latest technology innovation resulted from the collaborative projects with digital humanities institutions in Taiwan and abroad. Through online discussion with participants, we hope to deepen the infrastructure of global digital humanities and develop a blueprint for its future development.
國立臺灣大學數位人文研究中心將於2020年12月17–18日，舉辦「國際漢學數位人文科技學術研討會」，會議採線上視訊方式進行，議題含括數位人文的系統與技術，透過三個場次，向國內外學界發布臺灣大學數位人文研究中心近年來在數位人文國內外合作項目上的創新成果。本會議亦邀請到多位國內外合作機構的學者專家共同參與論壇，透過線上交流，與所有與會者共同擘劃數位人文未來的發展藍圖，歡迎國內外學人踴躍報名參加。
